message.body: Hey hunter! Michael forwarded you a message yesterday that I sent to him about building soap molds. He thought it would be easier for you to help me. I'm
willing to trade you some soaps for the job... Or some other work. Let me know if this is something you'd want to do!
Hey Liz. I don't need any soap. I can do it for $20/hr next Tuesday. Or if you want to exchange labor, I need a bunch of glass cut for picture frames
I'm in crutches because of foot surgery. That's why I can't make them myself.... It's OK. I'll find another way
I can't do work that requires standing :( like cutting glass. But I can do other work where I can sit and do it... Like hinging art and stuff like that
But I'm assuming you don't need that.
Actually maybe I can just pay you. I'll let you know after I do my bills tomorrow. It won't take more than 2 hrs, right?
